Entries.1655006/F/w rainy/f Biscuit 2500: AbigailFlute/39 43/Biscuit 39 41 2 farmer 21 40 1/ignoreCollisions Biscuit-gift/ignoreCollisions farmer/addTemporaryActor Biscuit-gift 16 32 1000 1000 2 false/skippable/animate Biscuit false true 190 92 93/move farmer 16 0 1/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 1000/speak Biscuit "Some weather huh, @?"/textAboveHead Farmer "..."/pause 1000/speak Biscuit "I don't mind the rain too much, but it reminds me of that night.... $11"/textAboveHead Farmer "?"/speak Biscuit "The night I ended up leaving Zuzu for good. It was raining just like this. $11"/stopAnimation Biscuit 94/showFrame Biscuit 94/speak Biscuit "That was a really hard time. One minute I was sleeping beside Miss Margret and the next there were loud, flashing cars and strange men that came in. $11"/pause 1000/showFrame Biscuit 95/speak Biscuit "The loud car and strange men took Miss Margret away and I never saw her again.... $11"/textAboveHead Farmer ")="/pause 1000/speak Biscuit "The next day I waited for her to come home, but some people I didn't know came instead. They put me outside and shut the door and wouldn't let me back in $11"/showFrame Biscuit 94/speak Biscuit "I waited around for a few days, but she never came back... Someone saw me hanging around and yelled at me so I ran away. $11#$b# Everything was so confusing. Even now I have a hard time trying to figure out what happened. $11"/pause 1000/speak Biscuit "I get scared sometimes that someone in a flashing car will come here and take Granny or George or anyone else I love away and it makes my chest hurt. $11"/textAboveHead Farmer "..."/showFrame Biscuit 95/textAboveHead Biscuit "*sigh*"/speak Biscuit "Sorry. I guess this is kind of a bummer topic, huh?#$b# You're just such a good listener, @! $10"/pause 1000/showFrame Biscuit 12/beginSimultaneousCommand/playSound dog_bark/jump Biscuit/endSimultaneousCommand/speak Biscuit "I just remembered something! $7"/showFrame Biscuit 12/speed Biscuit 4/Move Biscuit -2 0 3/speed Biscuit 4/Move Biscuit 0 -1 0/speed Biscuit 4/Move Biscuit -6 0 3/showFrame Biscuit 12/pause 500/animate Biscuit false false 190 36 37/animate Biscuit true false 180 56 57 58 59 56 57 58 59 56 57 58 59 60 61 62 63/pause 1000/addObject 30 40 74/stopAnimation Biscuit 63/move Biscuit -2 0 3/pause 500/faceDirection Biscuit 1/speak Biscuit "I found this and I thought you might like it!#$b# You've been a really good friend to me and I heard Mister Gunther say the "rainbow" Shinies were worth a lot so I went digging for one! $10"/beginSimultaneousCommand/animate Biscuit false false 190 32 33 34/animate Biscuit false true 190 35 34/Move farmer 0 -1 0/Move farmer -6 0 3/endSimultaneousCommand/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 32/viewport move 0 -2 4000/globalFade/viewport -200 -200/speak Biscuit-gift "Biscuit sure has lived through a lot, hasn't she?. Perhaps moving to the valley will be the best thing for her in the end. After all, this town has a habit of giving those who live here what matters most in life. [74]"/end
